item.title: 2022 Recap
item.description: The results of the year and a little bit about my future. It’s two in the morning and I just finished editing a new YouTube video. An idea popped into my head and boom two hours of recording, two hours of editing and three hours of coloring footage just dissapeared. I happily finished, went to take a smoke break and suddenly I was surprised and asked myself… Why am I doing this?
